location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, to Captain Charles Sealy, Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: In this letter James Pringle Riach, Assistant Surgeon, Bushire, informs Captain Charles Sealy, Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf, that he has requested that the Nautilusproceed first to Sharga [Sharjah] and then to Rasel Khyma [Ra's al-Khaymah], for the purpose of delivering a packet to Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, the Bushire Resident, who is currently on a tour of the lower part of the Gulf.
